name: Numeral
headline: SaaS & Ecommerce sales tax on autopilot.
description: Numeral handles all aspects of sales tax from registration to remittance for SaaS and e-commerce stores. We offer complete, white-glove service end to end.

founders.name: Kevin Liu, Founder
founders.description: Licensed CPA in the state of California. Previously worked in big 4 accounting at KPMG. Since leaving KPMG, Kevin has built numerous e-commerce business, ranging from 7 figure dropship accounts to 8 figure Shopify brands.

founders.name: Matt DuVall, Founder
founders.description: Long-time product engineer, launched Stripe Checkout and Stripe Radar (2014-19), led teams on performance and product at Notion (2020-2022).

founders.name: Sam Ross, Founder
founders.description: Founded an e-commerce studio that generated over $50M in revenue over the last 4 years. Previously growth & product @ Airbnb, Teespring.

## Stay compliant and automate away sales tax.
Intelligent workflows for registration, filing, and remittance—backed by white-glove customer support.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fe7042804e3d54e81443a6/67a3a9e80ab03b59b6ab1fd8_v3_home-page-ui-image.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fe7042804e3d54e81443a6/679c97309935a9e29385cf2f_bar-chart-10.svg)
### Monitor and register
Identify where you have tax liability and automatically register when you exceed a threshold or establish nexus.
[Learn more](https://numeralhq.com/</demo>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fe7042804e3d54e81443a6/679cf9de347b3d822c04343a_Monitor%20and%20register.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fe7042804e3d54e81443a6/679c972fc335015e589bea4e_folder.svg)
### File and remit
Returns are prepared and payments are made—on time, every time. Detailed reporting and filing history are just a click away.
[Learn more](https://numeralhq.com/</demo>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fe7042804e3d54e81443a6/679cf9de00ed1a558290f392_File%20and%20remit.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fe7042804e3d54e81443a6/679c972f861427f7061fd081_pie-chart-01.svg)
### Calculate and collect
Use the Numeral Tax API to integrate tax calculation with your billing platform or custom checkout.
[Learn more](https://numeralhq.com/</demo>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fe7042804e3d54e81443a6/679cf9defef351adbef631bd_Calculate%20and%20collect.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fe7042804e3d54e81443a6/679c972ffc527c2e4935d949_check-verified-03.svg)
### Manage exemptions
Protect your business and prove compliance during audits by verifying your customers’ exemption certificates.
[Learn more](https://numeralhq.com/</demo>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fe7042804e3d54e81443a6/679cf9de15b4d0bf15b25230_Manage%20exemptions.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fe7042804e3d54e81443a6/679c9730e77d9ce9d45cecd0_mail-01.svg)
### Virtual mailboxes
We scan, read, and respond to all your sales tax mail from state and local governments.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fe7042804e3d54e81443a6/678e1b4c586a460a1757308e_v3_home-tab-slider-image-5.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fe7042804e3d54e81443a6/679c972f754dd75821fd2ad3_folder-check.svg)
### Our guarantee
We guarantee your sales tax is filed on time, or we’ll pay your penalties and interest charges.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fe7042804e3d54e81443a6/678e1b4c586a460a1757308e_v3_home-tab-slider-image-5.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fe7042804e3d54e81443a6/679c972ffd2f81997c39dd7e_message-text-square-02.svg)
### White glove support
Expert guidance every step of the way. Chat with us, send an email, or give us a call anytime.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fe7042804e3d54e81443a6/678e1b4c586a460a1757308e_v3_home-tab-slider-image-5.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fe7042804e3d54e81443a6/679c972f9393f1b8578b3b33_credit-card-x.svg)
### Simple pricing
No long-term contract needed. You'll pay for registration and filing.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fe7042804e3d54e81443a6/678e1b4c586a460a1757308e_v3_home-tab-slider-image-5.avif)
### Simple integrations and end-to-end tax support as your business grows.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fe7042804e3d54e81443a6/679b7bae9dcb6eaedc266f60_v3_stripe_gray-warm-900.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fe7042804e3d54e81443a6/679b7bae7c2214a8d833346b_v3_netsuite_gray-warm-900.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fe7042804e3d54e81443a6/679b7bae6ee14a2f9334e9a7_v3_amazon_gray-warm-900.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fe7042804e3d54e81443a6/679b7bae1720fd79358c8263_v3_walmart_gray-warm-900.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fe7042804e3d54e81443a6/679b7baea97b79c676ec9eda_v3_shopify_gray-warm-900.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fe7042804e3d54e81443a6/679b7bae68ed600e8a5da1df_v3_intuit-quickbooks_gray-warm-900.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fe7042804e3d54e81443a6/679b7bae69e5599341ab3973_v3_ebay_gray-warm-900.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fe7042804e3d54e81443a6/679b7bae0548c79bf06ade9c_v3_salesforce_gray-warm-900.svg)
## Let the results speak for themselves.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64065ed0bdb899d178d33db8/67a5be065d8e9a7fdfa4f525_v3_testimonial-jason-wong.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64065ed0bdb899d178d33db8/67a47560c61eac5d36db8b2c_v3_doe-logo-white.svg)
[Read story](https://numeralhq.com/</customers/doe-beauty>)
Numeral tailors its solution to each client’s needs. Everything is customized. And I loved that I could talk to sales tax experts. Numeral guarantees no compliance mistakes will happen. Nobody else was willing to make that promise.
Jason Wong
Founder, Doe Lashes
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64065ed0bdb899d178d33db8/67a5be313de0354a78584af5_v3_testimonial-kevin-chanthasiriphan.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64065ed0bdb899d178d33db8/67a4754e48e56fc2434bda63_v3_immi-logo-white.svg)
[Read story](https://numeralhq.com/</customers/immi>)
We had many issues with TaxJar, including incorrect tax filings that resulted in an overpayment of $5,700 and non-existent customer support. Numeral provided complete onboarding, prompt customer service, and rapid feature additions based on customer input.
Kevin Chanthasiriphan
Founder, immi
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64065ed0bdb899d178d33db8/67a5be65dfc9e7a0e7035591_v3_testimonial-jesse-hiss.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64065ed0bdb899d178d33db8/67a4757b541771441d3c2647_v3_fresh-sends-logo-white.svg)
[Read story](https://numeralhq.com/</customers/fresh-sends>)
I was spending way too many hours every month on sales tax. Numeral has made it easy to identify and know the tax laws. And then, on your behalf, registering and managing everything takes the worry off my plate.
Jesse Hiss
Founder, Fresh Sends
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64065ed0bdb899d178d33db8/67a5bee2a156b89fc8cf5059_v3_testimonial-adrian-zhang.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64065ed0bdb899d178d33db8/67a4756dbb75f193f3f7d87f_v3_woobles-logo-white.svg)
[Read story](https://numeralhq.com/</customers/the-woobles>)
It's set it and forget it. At the end of the day, I'd much rather spend time growing our business than worrying about sales tax. We love Numeral. I don't know how you squeeze a number out of it, but I'd give working with them a 10 out of 10.
Adrian Zhang
Co-founder, The Woobles
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64065ed0bdb899d178d33db8/67a5bf127529a59d801c8420_v3_testimonial-tom-phillips.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64065ed0bdb899d178d33db8/664744710b4d44dd2bea52b2_bro%20glo%20logo%202.jpg)
[Read story](https://numeralhq.com/</customers/bro-glo>)
Numeral worked with us to figure out where we stood at the time and where we should be. They ensured that we were a compliant business and doing everything correctly. It's set it and forget it.
Tom Phillips
Co-founder, Bro Glo
## Getting started with Numeral
Simplify sales tax in less than 30 days.
Day 1
Get started
  * Sign up or schedule a demo
  * Connect your billing platforms
  * Review your free tax analysis


Day 2
Dedicated onboarding
  * Identify exposure and tax liability
  * Complete account setup
  * Transfer existing registrations


Day 30
Stay compliant
  * Automatic tax filings and payments
  * Advanced reporting and dashboards
  * Let us worry about sales tax

Intelligent workflows for registration, filing, and remittance—backed by white-glove customer support.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fe7042804e3d54e81443a6/67a3a9e80ab03b59b6ab1fd8_v3_home-page-ui-image.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fe7042804e3d54e81443a6/679c97309935a9e29385cf2f_bar-chart-10.svg)
### Monitor and register
Identify where you have tax liability and automatically register when you exceed a threshold or establish nexus.
Learn more⟨16⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fe7042804e3d54e81443a6/679cf9de347b3d822c04343a_Monitor%20and%20register.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63fe7042804e3d54e81443a6/679c972fc335015e589bea4e_folder.svg)
### File and remit
Returns are prepared and payments are made—on time, every time. Detailed reporting and filing history are just a click away.

Use the Numeral Tax API to integrate tax calculation with your billing platform or custom checkout.

### Manage exemptions

### Virtual mailboxes
We scan, read, and respond to all your sales tax mail from state and local governments.

We guarantee your sales tax is filed on time, or we’ll pay your penalties and interest charges.

Expert guidance every step of the way. Chat with us, send an email, or give us a call anytime.

generated_description:
Numeral is a San Francisco-based startup that automates sales tax compliance for SaaS and e-commerce businesses. Founded in 2022 and a proud member of Y Combinator's W23 batch, Numeral’s mission is to take the hassle out of sales tax—let's face it, most people would rather focus on growing their business than keeping track of government regulations.

The cornerstone of Numeral's offering is its comprehensive, white-glove service. This means they handle everything from tax registration to remittance, ensuring that clients spend less than five minutes a month worrying about sales tax compliance. Essentially, they make sales tax “on autopilot.”

The company has a streamlined and intelligent process that starts with identifying where clients have tax liabilities and automatically registering them once they hit specific thresholds or establish a nexus. They prepare returns and manage payments timely, backed by detailed reporting and a robust tax API that integrates seamlessly with billing platforms. If exemptions are a concern, Numeral helps clients verify their customers’ exemption certificates and manage their compliance status efficiently.

With a dedicated team of around 25 employees and expert support at every step, Numeral aims to make sales tax compliance easy and stress-free. Their promise? If they ever file late, they’ll cover any penalties or interest charges incurred—talk about confidence in your service!

Their clients rave about the personal touch and effective support, with testimonials showcasing that Numeral helps businesses shift their focus back to growth while they take care of tax logistics. In a crowded space of tax compliance services, Numeral differentiates itself with a strong reliance on personalized service and cutting-edge technology.

If you’re looking for a solution that simplifies your tax workflow, Numeral offers a straightforward pricing model with no long-term contracts—a refreshing change in the SaaS space. Interested parties can easily get started with a simple sign-up or demo request.

In short, with Numeral, you can rest easy knowing your sales tax is in capable hands, giving you back the time to do what you do best: run your business. For more info, check them out at [Numeral HQ](https://numeralhq.com/).
